name: initiate_payment
description: Initiates a blockchain payment for a task. Call this when the user wants to order, buy, or pay for a task. The user must have a connected wallet. This triggers a wallet transaction popup on the user's device.

task_id.description: The unique ID of the task to pay for

payment_method.description: Payment method: 'usdc' for USDC stablecoin or 'native' for ETH
